title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the ObservabilityDashboard project. This includes: types of data to be monitored (e.g., CPU usage, memory consumption, network traffic, log analysis), desired visualizations (e.g., graphs, charts, tables), target users (e.g., system administrators, IT managers, developers), and any additional features requested by stakeholders. The gathered requirements will serve as a foundation for the subsequent development phases.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the ObservabilityDashboard system, including the data collection, processing, and storage components, as well as the user interface.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including the necessary tools, frameworks, and libraries for building the ObservabilityDashboard.

title: Implement Data Collection and Processing
description: Develop the components responsible for collecting and processing data from various sources within the organization's IT infrastructure.

title: Design and Implement Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for the ObservabilityDashboard, considering scalability, performance, and security requirements.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the ObservabilityDashboard, including visualizations, dashboards, and user interactions.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the ObservabilityDashboard system and the data it handles, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and implement a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the ObservabilityDashboard project to streamline the development and deployment processes.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance activities, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the ObservabilityDashboard meets the defined requirements and standards.

title: Prepare Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the ObservabilityDashboard project, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the ObservabilityDashboard system to the production environment, and set up monitoring and alerting mechanisms to ensure its proper functioning and performance.
